thought: To craft a tripwire_hook, I need to craft an iron_ingot. To do so, I will first move one iron_nugget from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
